class.name: AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback
class.description: Allows control of [AnimationTree] state machines created with [AnimationNodeStateMachine]. Retrieve with [code]$AnimationTree.get("parameters/playback")[/code]. [b]Example:[/b] [codeblocks] [gdscript] var state_machine = $AnimationTree.get("parameters/playback") state_machine.travel("some_state") [/gdscript] [csharp] var stateMachine = GetNode<AnimationTree>("AnimationTree").Get("parameters/playback") as AnimationNodeStateMachinePlayback; stateMachine.Travel("some_state"); [/csharp] [/codeblocks]

method.name: get_current_node
method.description: Returns the currently playing animation state.

method.name: get_travel_path
method.description: Returns the current travel path as computed internally by the A* algorithm.

method.name: is_playing
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if an animation is playing.

method.name: travel
method.description: Transitions from the current state to another one, following the shortest path.
